text: Hardo Aasmäe (February 11, 1951 – December 29, 2014) was an Estonian geographer, entrepreneur, and politician. He was active in the Estonian People's Front. He was the first post-Soviet mayor of Tallinn, from 1990 to 1992.www.ohtuleht.ee Aasmäe died in Tallinn, Estonia, aged 63. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Estonian mayors
title: Hardo Aasmäe
